City of Crane Crime Stoppers
----------------------------

Do you have information on a crime?  You can call  432-558-7867 and remain anonymous.  You can also email
[cranepd@crane.texas.gov](mailto:cranepd@crane.texas.gov)
.

[Crime Stoppers](https://crane.texas.gov/city-departments/police-department/#CrimeStoppers)

[Learn More…](https://crane.texas.gov/city-departments/police-department/#text-911)

Many people do not know that the capability to text 9-1-1 exists. Text to 9-1-1- is a service that allows citizens to send a text message diectly to 9-1-1 for assistance in the event they are unable to make a voice call.  Simply send a text as you would normally.  In the recipient field enter 911, compose the message, and push send.  If you would like more information about Text-to 9-1-1, please contact Jill Blackshear, Communications Supervisor with the Crane Police Department at 432-558-2212 or email at
[jblackshear@crane.texas.gov](mailto:jblackshear@crane.texas.gov)
.  You can also visit the Permian Basin Regional Planning Commission website at
[www.pbrpc.org](http://www.pbrpc.org)
.

[Commendation Form](https://crane.texas.gov/city-departments/police-department/#commendation)
[Complaint Form](https://crane.texas.gov/city-departments/police-department/#complaint)
![](https://crane.texas.gov/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/crimestoppers.jpg "crimestoppers")


Did you have a positive interaction with an officer or other staff member, and want to let them know you appreciate their service?  Please let us know using this form below.

Phone

Email Address

Download and fill out the form below. The completed form may then be scanned and emailed as an attachment to
[cranepd@crane.texas.gov](mailto:jlittle@crane.texas.gov?subject=Crane%20PD%20Complaint&body=Please%20attach%20the%20completed%20form.)
The completed form can also be mailed or delivered in-person to Crane Police Department (see address at top of this page)

[Complaint Form](https://crane.texas.gov/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/CranePD_Citizen-Complaint-Form.pdf)
